name: Digital-marginalia
tagline: A project to create a social literary annotation engine.
body:
### Welcome to Digital Marginalia. 
There's not much here yet. 

Collaborators are welcome. Clone this project and hack away. 

```
$ git clone https://github.com/JonathanReeve/digital-marginalia.git
```

### Contact
For questions and comments, please contact [jon.reeve@gmail.com](mailto:jon.reeve@gmail.com).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
